Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a go-ahead grand slam in the sixth inning to send the New York Mets to their first NLCS in nine years
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos reflected on the series loss, acknowledging the New York Mets' performance and giving them credit for their playoff run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Philadelphia Phillies finished six games ahead of the Mets in the regular season standings but were outplayed in the playoffs
